title: Cream of chicken soup
ingredients: ['50g (2 oz) butter', '2 onions, diced', '2 medium potatoes, chopped', '1 large carrot, diced', '1 celery stick, diced', '750ml (1 1/4 pt) chicken stock', 'salt and ground black pepper', '25g (1 oz) plain flour', '150ml (1/4 pt) milk', '175g (6 oz) cooked chicken', '300ml (1/2 pt) single cream', 'parsley leaves to garnish (optional)']
